description: My place is close to the subway, Soho, Chinatown, Little Italy, East Village, Williamsburg Bridge. Close to , Clinton St. Baking Company, La Esquina, The Meatball Shop, Pianos, Mission Chinese Food. You’ll love my place because of the location. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, and families (with kids).
name: Convenient apartment in great location
review:
Beautiful apartment! Great location! J train around the corner and orange line just three blocks from there.
Make was a great host as well, even through we went to pick our Keys somewhere else, she was always asking us if everything was ok.
We love the place!
